ygData.subject: Re: vengeful lyricist (was: Bards and Mob Hate) *spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay - I ran into that one, and at 14th, he was easy to solo, even though blue (I usually have problems with anything tougher than blue.  Blues seem equal to
ygData.messageBody:
Okay - I ran into that one, and at 14th, he was easy to solo, even though
blue (I usually have problems with anything tougher than blue. Blues seem
"equal" to me. Dunno why). Here's the weird thing - he had some pages from
a diary, and I remembered hearing about that not too long ago, so I tucked
the pages away (after reading them *hehe*), but when I got to Halas....
M
A
N
D
T
O
R
Y

S
P
O
I
L
E
R

S
P
A
C
E

I ran into a lady wandering the main part of town, when hailed complained
about her missing brother. After talking to her for a moment, I determined
that she was looking for the missing pages to his diary. Thinks me, "Hey -
those pages!" so I give them to her. But they aren't the right pages. :P
Dunno why? Any ideas?


Talies the Wanderer
<The Wandering Minstrels>
Bristlebane
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
